name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Rice Krispie Treats
steps: Add about six cups Rice Krispies.. Stir together. On a cookie sheet, with wax paper and a greased spatula, lay
out Rice Krispies in a large rectangle.
Heat for two minutes. Stir. Pour chocolate mixture on to Rice Krispies, leaving ½ inch border on edges. Roll
lengthwise, and put log in refrigerator until solid. Cut into ½ inch slices.
